name: See Joe Run
description: This game was created for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. The theme is "only one" which I applied to the gameplay controls. Just one button. I spent about 18 hours making the game including development and finding/modifying art assets. This is my first game jam submission and I'm pretty proud of it. I'd like the game to be longer, and have a menu for choosing your level, etc. but that wasn't in the cards with such a short development cycle. I may add to it later though. I hope you enjoy it.
